workplace-senior.title: 關於Justin Lee李明剛
workplace-senior.description1: 始於電子商務，熟悉行動支付，歷經創新創業、走過兩岸通路、沉浸高階獵才、樂於分享實務。
workplace-senior.description2: 出身於資訊管理，因為好奇心與坐不住的性格，產品業務行銷創業兩岸獵才橫豎走了一遭。也許看得稍微多了點，許許多多的心得忍不住分享！未來，希望貢獻一點心力，幫助更多的朋友教學相長，協助更多的企業走出舞台！
experiences: 藍天百腦匯集團 總裁室副處長
30 年前電商系統市佔第一
20 年前電信支付創新專利
10 年中兩岸通路潮起潮落

1.提供各部位美容、美體、精油芳療技術服務。< br/ >2.提供課程及產品銷售服務。
3.提供美容保養、精油芳療、壓力抒解及養生保健等知識傳達。
4.上班時間星期一~星期六10:00~20:30，星期日公休
5.服務滿一年享年特休假
6.享生日禮生及年節禮品、員購優惠
7.客源穩定、薪資有保障
8.受訓期間亦有底薪，無經驗免擔心，不需額外支付保證金

manageJobList.jobName: 人資經理(知名連鎖餐飲業)___218IS
manageJobList.jobNameSnippet: 人資經理(知名連鎖餐飲業)___218IS
manageJobList.description:
1.建立完整的召募與任用制度（職務說明書、薪資結構、召募甄選流程與工具）
2.開發多源召募管道及依公司需求召募中高階主管
3.熟悉人力資源相關作業流程及勞動法令。
4.負責公司相關HR政策、制度規章的制訂/修改。
5.規劃與執行人力資源專案，並進行需求分析及成效評估。 
6.跨單位溝通、協調及整合能力強。
manageJobList.custName: 萬XX股份有限公司(獵派)(365A/1500職務-20180904到期)

manageJobList.jobName: 薪酬福利經理(知名電信業)___218IS
manageJobList.jobNameSnippet: 薪酬福利經理(知名電信業)___218IS
manageJobList.description:
1. Have experience for building up competence based HRM system, succession plan, retention program and performance management.
2. Monitors the job market, the modern trends in the compensation and finds the best practice for the implementation.
3. Manage the compensation policies and procedures with the flexibility while keeping the internal equity and the external competitiveness.
4. Work closely with the top management, supporting decisions and providing the evidence for discussions within business units.
5. Develop the basic compensation structures in the organization (grading system, job evaluation system, job description policy, promotion policy, etc) aligned with the corporate culture and the corporate values
6. Coordinates compensation processes like the salary planning, bonus planning and incentive schemes development
7. Approves exceptions in the compensation of the individual employees
8. Trains HR Business Partners and line managers in the compensation area (pay-mix training, etc.)
9. Leads different HR Projects (not just projects from the compensation and benefits area)
10. Represents the organization at different HR conferences
11. Good at the number and assessment skills
12. HRBP experiences is plus.
manageJobList.custName: 萬XX股份有限公司(獵派)(365A/1500職務-20180904到期)

manageJobList.jobName: (S-MS-01) 技術服務經理 Managed Service Delivery Manager
manageJobList.jobNameSnippet: (S-MS-01) 技術服務經理 Managed Service Delivery Manager
manageJobList.description:
• Pre-sales support activity include presentation and proposal, SOW preparation.
• Customer needs/requirements analysis, solution architecture design, product sourcing, and project management for the system integration project.
• Customer needs/requirements analysis, solution architecture design, end to end operation processes design, and project management for the managed services project.
• Assist sales to maintain the relationship of clients.
• Vender managment.
• Co-work with regional headquarter to introduce products and services in company portfolio into Taiwan.
